# Pipelines Endpoints

Pipeline workflow scheduling and orchestration.

## `GET /pipelines`

List pipelines

Returns a paginated list of pipelines.

- Operation ID: `listPipelines`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated list of pipelines |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /pipelines`

Create a pipeline

Creates a new pipeline workflow definition.

- Operation ID: `createPipeline`

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Created pipeline |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /pipelines/runs/{runId}`

Get a pipeline run

Retrieves the details of a specific pipeline run.

- Operation ID: `getPipelineRun`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `runId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the pipeline run. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Pipeline run details |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /pipelines/runs/{runId}/cancel`

Cancel a pipeline run

Cancels a running or pending pipeline run.

- Operation ID: `cancelPipelineRun`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `runId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the pipeline run. |

| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /pipelines/{pipelineName}`

Delete a pipeline

Deletes a pipeline and all its associated jobs.

- Operation ID: `deletePipeline`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `pipelineName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the pipeline. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Pipeline deleted |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /pipelines/{pipelineName}/runs`

List runs for a pipeline

Returns a paginated list of runs for the specified pipeline.

- Operation ID: `listPipelineRuns`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `pipelineName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the pipeline. |

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |
| `status` | `string` | `false` | Filter runs by status. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated list of pipeline runs |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /pipelines/{pipelineName}/runs`

Trigger a pipeline run

Manually triggers a new run of the specified pipeline.

- Operation ID: `triggerPipelineRun`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `pipelineName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the pipeline. |

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Triggered pipeline run |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |
